snippet.title: Raider Kid and the Ruby Chest
snippet.description:
Take some time off your family vacations and delve into ancient ruins! A gameboy inspired game in development by Cacareco Games. Try out the demo for Windows, macOS, and Linux:
on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1085040/Raider_Kid_and_the_Ruby_Chest/?beta=1 on Itch.io: https://cacareco.itch.io/ruby
